component.name: PMnHRD-1
component.summary: Program for taking psychological tests (PMnHRD task)

description.p: This application is designed to help users complete various psychological tests about management. It provides a user-friendly interface, twenty one test separated into seven topics. It includes various test modules such as personality assessment, stress management, and leadership skills evaluation.
The application was developed as BSUIR task for "Psychology of Management and Development of Human Resources" subject.
